ðŸ“– Summary: dnSurfer is a proof-of-concept web browser that operates entirely over the DNS protocol. It includes a desktop client built with Electron and a custom DNS server implemented in Node.js, allowing users to browse text-only web content even when HTTP/HTTPS is blocked.
